# withWeekOfYear | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

- [ ISO8601DateFormatter ](/documentation/foundation/iso8601dateformatter)

-  withWeekOfYear 

Type Property# withWeekOfYear

iOS 10.0+iPadOS 10.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.12+tvOS 10.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 3.0+

```
static var withWeekOfYear: ISO8601DateFormatter.Options { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/foundation/iso8601dateformatter/options/withweekofyear#Discussion)

The date representation includes the week of the year. The format for week of year is `ww`, including the `W` prefix.

## [See Also](/documentation/foundation/iso8601dateformatter/options/withweekofyear#see-also)
